preface.title: 1. Project Preface
preface.content1: Global financial civilization is at a new critical point. The US dollar hegemony is loosening, AI is rewriting financial logic, and the global capital system is moving towards new multipolarity.
preface.content2: Against this backdrop, USD.online emerges as more than a simple financial platform, but as an incubator and experimental field for the USDV civilization biochain: a global stage that integrates AI Ã— Blockchain Ã— Philanthropic Finance.
preface.visionDesc: Making capital no longer cold but warm; making wealth not just grow but create civilizational resonance.

marketPains.title: 2. Market Pain Points

traditional.title: Traditional Finance Dilemmas
traditional.point1: Cross-border capital flow restrictions: dependence on central banks and clearing systems, low efficiency, high costs.
traditional.point2: Information asymmetry: insufficient transparency, extremely high trust costs.

crypto.title: Crypto Finance Limitations
crypto.point1: Fragmented isolation: CEX and DEX liquidity islands, low capital efficiency.
crypto.point2: Heavy speculation: lack of long-term value anchoring, insufficient market trust.

charity.title: Philanthropic Finance Gaps
charity.point1: Opaque donation funds: public cannot track fund flows.
charity.point2: Goodwill cannot be amplified: philanthropy stuck at 'donation' level, not combined with capital.

marketPains.conclusion: ðŸ‘‰ Old world destiny: inefficient, fragmented, opaque. USD.online's mission: integrating capital with philanthropy to reshape global financial civilization.

growthModel.point1: Invitation code virality: bind once, effective forever.

crossChainEngine.title: Cross-chain Alpha Engine
crossChainEngine.description: Millisecond arbitrage and MEV operations, capturing instantaneous value in capital gaps
crossChainEngine.positioning: Positioning: Multi-chain price difference capture + order flow time value + new asset early dividends
crossChainEngine.execution: Execution: 24/7 intelligent scheduling, dynamic allocation of funds among three sub-strategies
crossChainEngine.risk: Risk: Medium (sub-strategy layering, unified risk control thresholds)
crossChainEngine.strategyALogic: Logic: Same asset shows instantaneous price differences across different chains and pools â†’ low-latency matching and hedging arbitrage.
crossChainEngine.strategyAMeans: Means: Self-built routing, batch signing, slippage estimation; bridge whitelist and confirmation windows.
crossChainEngine.strategyAKPI: KPI: Per-unit capital return, gross win rate, drawdown and recovery duration.
crossChainEngine.strategyARisk: Risk control: Pause thresholds (deviation > set bp), bridge delay alerts, pool depth lower limits.
crossChainEngine.strategyB: B. Low-Risk MEV (Time Value rather than Aggressive)
crossChainEngine.strategyBLogic: Logic: Utilize the time value of matching order (liquidation tail difference, delayed arbitrage, merged routing).
crossChainEngine.strategyBMeans: Means: Private RPC, Bundle submission, order cancellation cooling time window.
crossChainEngine.strategyBKPI: KPI: Success rate, failure cost rate, Gas cost proportion.
crossChainEngine.strategyBRisk: Risk control: Blacklist contracts/routing, Gas upper limit, adaptive cancellation.
crossChainEngine.strategyC: C. New Token Sniping | Discovery & Sniping (Optional Enable)
crossChainEngine.strategyCTarget: Target: In the very early launch/pool opening stage, conduct small-scale multi-point trial and follow around real projects and real liquidity.
crossChainEngine.strategyCSignal: Signal sources: Factory PairCreated events, Router initial pool, Launchpad calendar, KOL lists, on-chain social/multi-sig activities.
crossChainEngine.strategyCFilter1: Contract not upgradeable/or locked (or multi-sig threshold â‰¥N)
crossChainEngine.strategyCFilter2: Initial LP â‰¥ threshold and LP lock/burn verifiable
crossChainEngine.strategyCFilter4: Top holder ratio and Top10 concentration â‰¤ threshold
crossChainEngine.streamegyCFilterSoft: Soft conditions (scoring): Contract quality, audit status, external buzz, historical wallet profiles, fund source cleanliness.
crossChainEngine.strategyCFunding: Funding model: Micro position + grid (e.g., 0.1â€“0.5 base units/time, multiple distributed entries)
crossChainEngine.strategyCMatch1: Enter after pool unlock delay Î´ seconds (avoid black box opening)
crossChainEngine.strategyCMatch2: Limit price/slippage cap; immediately set stop-loss/take-profit (on-chain or offline monitoring trigger)
crossChainEngine.strategyCMatch3: Observe buy/sell walls and actual contract tax rate, retreat immediately on anomalies
crossChainEngine.strategyCExit3: Liquidity withdrawal real-time alert â†’ immediate liquidation
crossChainEngine.strategyCIndicators1: Hit rate (sample size/win rate), profit-loss ratio, average holding duration
crossChainEngine.strategyCIndicators2: Rug/tax anomaly event count and loss cap
crossChainEngine.strategyCIndicators3: Net performance: per-unit capital return after deducting Gas/tax/failure costs
crossChainEngine.strategyCRisk1: Daily/weekly strategy funding cap (X% of total pool)
crossChainEngine.strategyCRisk2: Single project maximum exposure (â‰¤ y% of strategy funds)
crossChainEngine.strategyCRisk3: Circuit breaker: consecutive N anomalies/losses trigger strategy pause
crossChainEngine.strategyCRisk4: Blacklist: suspicious Factory/Router/tax contracts one-click network-wide ban
crossChainEngine.strategyCRisk5: Disclosure: new token strategy independent curve and anomaly event logs publicly disclosed

aiRotation.title: AI Adaptive Yield Rotation
aiRotation.description: GPT-4 driven wealth brain, mainstream asset trend prediction and automatic rebalancing
aiRotation.positioning: Positioning: Use AI signals for position and weight scheduling, underlying execution by three verifiable sub-strategies.
aiRotation.assetRange: Asset range: BTC / ETH / SOL (expandable to other mainstream).
aiRotation.risk: Risk: Medium-low (not pursuing extreme leverage, emphasizing drawdown control).
aiRotation.strategyA: A | Mainstream Crypto Grid Trading (Range Volatility Capture)
aiRotation.strategyALogic: Logic: In sideways or oscillating markets, buy and sell at preset price differences level by level, earning from back-and-forth volatility.
aiRotation.strategyAExecution1: Range adaptation: Use AI (volatility/trading density/capital flow) to dynamically select effective range and grid density.
aiRotation.strategyAExecution2: Capital layering: Base position (Î²) + grid position (Î±), preventing passive single-direction up/down.
aiRotation.strategyAExecution3: Deduplication and take-profit: Avoid same-price overlap when multiple grids stack; auto-clear grids when cumulative profit reaches threshold.
aiRotation.strategyARisk1: Unidirectional trend recognition: Auto-collect grids when breaking through channel upper/lower rails, reduce order density or pause.
aiRotation.strategyARisk2: Slippage & fee threshold: Auto-shrink if transaction friction > gross profit.
aiRotation.strategyAIndicators: Grid transaction count, win rate, per-unit capital return, maximum floating loss, net profit curve.
aiRotation.strategyBLogic: Logic: On CEX/DEX, go spot long + perpetual short (or reverse), earning positive/negative funding rates.
aiRotation.strategyBScenario: Applicable scenario: optimal when futures premium high/funding rate positive reward.
aiRotation.strategyBExecution1: Multi-exchange sampling: Select platforms with stable funding rates; AI evaluates funding rate sustainability and counterparty depth.
aiRotation.strategyBExecution2: Position hedging: Nominal exposure â‰ˆ 0, net exposure < threshold; rolling rollover before expiry.
aiRotation.strategyBExecution3: Fee and margin optimization: Reduce capital occupation, control liquidation risk.
aiRotation.strategyBRisk1: Extreme market protection: Quickly reduce hedge positions/adjust leverage when funding rates mutate or price differences imbalance.
aiRotation.strategyBRisk2: Counterparty and channels: Trigger migration or liquidation if platform risk rises (withdrawal congestion, abnormal volatility).
aiRotation.strategyBIndicators: Current average funding rate, APR (net), nominal exposure, margin utilization, liquidation distance, net value curve.
aiRotation.strategyC: C | Low Leverage Contracts (Trend Following / Drawdown Constraint)
aiRotation.strategyCLogic: Logic: AI generates trend/reversal signals, only 1â€“2Ã— low leverage, trading small drawdown for smoother returns.
aiRotation.strategyCExecution1: Signal fusion: Price momentum + capital flow + futures basis + macro/on-chain sentiment, determine long/short/wait.
aiRotation.strategyCExecution2: Position throttle: When win rate drops or volatility increases, auto-reduce leverage or lighten position.
aiRotation.strategyCExecution3: Stop-loss/take-profit: Fixed hard stop-loss + volatility adaptive stop-loss; batch take-profit.
aiRotation.strategyCRisk1: Single-side position cap: Single coin contract net long/short not exceeding x% of strategy funds.
aiRotation.strategyCRisk2: Event circuit breaker: Major event windows (FOMC, ETF large redemptions, etc.) downgrade or hedge only.
aiRotation.strategyCIndicators: Win rate, profit-loss ratio, maximum drawdown, consecutive loss count, position duration distribution, net value curve.

defiVault.title: Decentralized Staking Vault
defiVault.description: Native DeFi yield strategies: Interest mining (Aave/Compound) + LP market making (Curve/Uniswap V3) + incentive capture. Stablecoin-focused, on-chain traceable, contract permissions auditable.

strategyA.title: A | Interest and Points Mining (Lending / Points)
strategyA.logic: Logic: Distribute stablecoins across top lending/stablecoin protocols, obtain base interest rate (interest) + native incentives/points (points/airdrops), conduct dynamic migration and reinvestment under premise of positive net returns.
strategyA.assets: Covered assets: USDC / USDT / DAI / FRAX / crvUSD / USDe (sUSDe), etc.
strategyA.protocols: Candidate protocols (examples): Aave, Morpho, Spark (sDAI/DSR), FraxLend, Ethena (sUSDe)

executionPoints.point1: Distributed deployment: Set caps for single protocol/single counterparty, avoid concentrated exposure
executionPoints.point2: Net APY screening: Based on (interest + incentive) âˆ’ (Gas+slippage), not on nominal APY rush
executionPoints.point3: Migration rhythm: Migrate only when reaching yield decay threshold or better destination appears, control round-trip friction costs
executionPoints.point4: Incentive realization: Stage realization and reinvestment for points/airdrops, avoid one-time selling pressure

kpiPoints.point1: Portfolio net APY (friction costs deducted), incentive realization rate, capital turnover efficiency
kpiPoints.point2: Protocol diversification (Herfindahl index/single protocol ratio), capital in-transit time

riskPoints.point1: Protocol cap: Single protocol â‰¤ X% of portfolio (customizable)
riskPoints.point2: Monitoring: Audit/oracle/governance changes, TVL anomalies, utilization too high
riskPoints.point3: Contingency: One-click migration script, 7â€“10% cash cushion, 48â€“72 hour short-term financing window

strategyB.title: B | Stablecoin AMM Market Making (Stable AMM LP)
strategyB.logic: Logic: Provide liquidity for stablecoin pairs (e.g., USDC/USDT, DAI/USDC, FRAX/DAI, crvUSD/USDC, etc.), earn trading fees + protocol incentives, improve capital utilization through concentrated liquidity/tier movement and reduce impermanent loss.
strategyB.protocols: Candidate protocols (examples): Curve + Convex, Velodrome/Aerodrome, Uniswap V3 (stable pools)

executionPoints.point1: Only low-deviation pools: Same-type stablecoins/pegged assets, low historical deviation, large volume
executionPoints.point2: Concentrated liquidity: Place positions in actual trading dense areas, AI moves tiers based on volatility and volume
executionPoints.point3: Incentive stacking: Connect to aggregators (e.g., Convex) for secondary incentives, but don't sacrifice exit liquidity
executionPoints.point4: Fee-slippage balance: Dynamic weighting between fee improvement and transaction probability

kpiPoints.point1: Annualized fee rate (including incentives), impermanent loss estimate vs. realized, capital utilization
kpiPoints.point2: Pool depth/transaction ratio, slippage distribution, single pool exposure ratio

riskPoints.point1: Exit channel: Set minimum depth and maximum slippage thresholds, withdraw if not met
riskPoints.point2: Blacklist: Tax contracts/banned routing/abnormal Factory directly prohibited
riskPoints.point3: Extreme volatility: Trigger threshold (e.g., deviation > set bp) â†’ auto-converge range or temporarily withdraw

allocation.title: Funding Allocation (Example)
allocation.point1: Interest and points mining 60% | Stablecoin AMM market making 40%
allocation.point2: When incentive season/points active â†’ increase interest and points weight; when trading volume rises and volatility falls â†’ increase AMM market making weight.
allocation.point3: Portfolio drawdown threshold (e.g., -3% / -5%) triggers downgrade or temporary conservative mode only.

transparency.title: Transparency (Public Disclosure)
transparency.daily: Daily: Each protocol/pool position ratio, portfolio net APY, in-transit funds
transparency.weekly: Weekly: Net value and drawdown curve, migration and reinvestment log (Tx hash)
transparency.monthly: Monthly: Risk event review, cap and weight adjustment explanation

defiVault.disclaimer: The above protocols and assets are example lists, not endorsements; actual deployment will be based on risk control whitelist, audit status, and real-time indicators for dynamic screening.

transparentProtocol.title: On-chain Clear Transparent Protocol
transparentProtocol.direction: Direction: Only participate in official IDOs of top, trustworthy projects (e.g., MegaETH / Plasma), small-scale diversification, disciplined realization, full-process trackable.
transparentProtocol.admissionContract: Contract open-source + â‰¥1 audit; upgradeable requires multi-sig + timelock
transparentProtocol.admissionRules: Clear issuance rules: Total supply/initial circulation/unlock curve/LP arrangement publicly verifiable
transparentProtocol.admissionLP: Initial LP lock/burn verifiable; KYC/KYB and regional restriction compliant
transparentProtocol.fundingSingle: Single project cap â‰¤ 10â€“20% of new token pool
transparentProtocol.fundingDaily: Daily cumulative cap â‰¤ 2â€“5% of vault size
transparentProtocol.fundingSector: Set cap for same-sector same-day participation, avoid correlation stampede
transparentProtocol.subscriptionOfficial: Only through official IDO contracts; set maximum acceptable price band and Gas/slippage threshold
transparentProtocol.subscriptionVesting: After claim, enter Vesting address, sell in batches according to TGE + linear unlock
transparentProtocol.subscriptionStops: Preset take-profit tiers (e.g., +30% / +80% / +150%) and hard stop-loss (e.g., -20%), support TWAP fragmented execution
transparentProtocol.transparencyAddressBook: Public address book (Vault/Launch/Vesting/Realize) and all transaction hashes
transparentProtocol.transparencyDashboard: Dashboard display: Subscription amount, average price, slippage, win rate/profit-loss ratio, per-unit capital net return, maximum drawdown
transparentProtocol.riskTrap: Tax trap/blacklist/freezable clause projects one-vote veto
transparentProtocol.riskAbnormal: Consecutive anomalies or drawdown exceeding threshold â†’ this strategy pause/downgrade
transparentProtocol.riskNoPromise: No return promise, only execute rule-based verifiable participation and disciplined realization

cc.name: CC
cc.title: Founder of USD.ONLINE
cc.subtitle: Global Stablecoin Architect | Presidential Family Digital Asset Advisor | Cross-border Capital & AI Risk Control Expert
cc.bio: CC is one of the few experts in Asian and Middle Eastern capital circles who simultaneously possesses capabilities in cross-border capital structure design, institutional-grade liquidity management, AI risk control system construction, and sovereign-level stablecoin research. Over the past 8 years, he has deeply participated in institutional market making, cross-chain liquidity, quantitative fund management, and compliant clearing system construction globally, with historical AUM exceeding $15 billion.
cc.experience: He was invited to join the Presidential Family's Crypto Asset Office (Presidential Family Office) as one of the core digital asset advisors, providing strategic advice on crypto asset allocation, stablecoin reserve mechanisms, AI risk control systems, and global crypto policy research. This is an extremely rare experience globally, meaning he holds high trust and information access within the top American political and family capital systems.
cc.education: CC graduated from the London School of Economics (LSE), and has long promoted cross-border financial transparency, stablecoin governance improvement, and institutionalized application of AI for fund flow monitoring.

lee.name: Mr.Lee
lee.title: Partner at USD.ONLINE
lee.bio: A senior manager with over fifteen years of deep experience in the Swiss financial system, with extensive experience in strategic management, wealth management business development, cross-regional organizational transformation, and fintech implementation in major banking centers including Zurich, London, and Singapore. He has held multiple key leadership positions at UBS Group, one of the world's largest wealth management institutions, from Asia Pacific to the Americas to Swiss headquarters, fully participating in group strategy formulation, global business development, digital wealth management model reshaping, and multinational business coordination.
lee.career: His career began at traditional Swiss bank Credit Suisse, then joined Boston Consulting Group (BCG) for global financial institution strategic consulting, serving as a core member of BCG's Financial Institutions (FI) and Insurance dual practice groups. During this period, he drove digitalization, compliance restructuring, and transformation projects at multiple large banks and insurance groups, known for rapid promotion to Project Leader.

michael.name: Mr.Michael
michael.title: Co-founder & CTO (AI/Quantitative)
michael.point1: Previously worked at Wall Street's Renaissance Technologies hedge fund, covering statistical arbitrage, market making, and capital efficiency scheduling, leading the implementation of real-time risk control systems.
michael.point2: On the Web3 side, led on-chain data collection, anomaly detection, and MEV risk protection solutions.
michael.point3: Responsible for USD.online Alpha Engine and Clearing Engine technical roadmap, code review, and security audit coordination.
michael.education: Graduated from Yale University Computer Science Department

mouad.name: Mouad
mouad.title: Head of Institutional & Capital Markets & CMO at USD.ONLINE
mouad.subtitle: Exchange Listing/Market Making Alliance + Institutional Partnership Implementation
mouad.point1: Responsible for top and regional CEX listing, deposit/withdrawal integration, market making alliance and escort mechanisms.
mouad.point2: Expanding custody, audit, oracle, payment, and risk control vendor partnership footprint.
mouad.point3: Co-building investor communication, secondary market liquidity, and buyback execution coordination mechanisms.

omar.name: Omar
omar.title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO) at USD.online
omar.subtitle: Dubai Sovereign Capital Background | Cross-border Clearing & Reserve Management Expert | AI-Driven Financial Architecture Designer
omar.bio: Omar is a Dubai-based senior financial executive with over 17 years of comprehensive experience in Sovereign Wealth Funds, Middle Eastern family offices, cross-border clearing institutions, and digital financial regulatory frameworks (VARA/ADGM). He has long focused on cross-regional capital flow design, USD clearing networks, reserve asset management, and compliant financial structure construction.
omar.experience: Before joining USD.online, Omar managed multi-currency fund pools and USD reserves at Abu Dhabi Sovereign Wealth Fund (SWF), was responsible for cross-border asset allocation, clearing structures, and custody coordination at large Dubai family offices, and served as financial and risk advisor for multiple fintech companies. He is one of the few experts in the Middle East who can simultaneously understand traditional finance (TradFi) + digital assets (Web3) + cross-border compliance (RegTech) intersections.

conceptOrigin.title: ðŸ”¹ I. Concept Origin

evolutionLogic.title: ðŸ”¹ II. Evolution Logic
evolutionLogic.v1: â€¢ Moral Alpha 1.0 â†’ Charitable Donations: wealth and goodwill separated, make money first then donate.

â€¢ Moral Alpha 3.0 â†’ Algorithm-driven Ã— Embedded Charity Ã— Global Co-construction:
Wealth growth and human goodwill are no longer separated, but dual returns of the same algorithm.

motto.title: ðŸ”¹ V. Motto

conclusion.title: ðŸ“Œ Conclusion

preface.title: Preface
preface.content1: Human financial civilization is standing at a new threshold.
preface.content2: As AI becomes the main theme of our era, capital is no longer just cold numbersâ€”it is the flow of narratives, the power of consensus, and the language of algorithms.
preface.content3: The birth of USD.online is not a simple innovation in charity, but a symphony of wealth civilization and human civilization. It echoes between contribution and philanthropy, turning every yield into warmth and protection for children with autism around the world.
preface.point1: â€¢ Yield from contribution = The power of public good
preface.point2: â€¢ Capital flows = The surging of kindness
preface.point3: â€¢ Wealth accumulation = The resonance of the world
preface.conclusion: USD.online is not only a stage for capital and philanthropy, but also a new chapter in human civilization.

vision.title: Project Vision
vision.content1: The mission of USD.online goes beyond maximizing returnsâ€”it aims to shape a new order where financial civilization and philanthropic spirit are intertwined.
vision.point1: â€¢ Algorithms become the language of freedom
vision.point2: â€¢ Narratives become the source of wealth
vision.point3: â€¢ Capital becomes the pulse of the world
vision.point4: â€¢ Public good becomes the brilliance of humanity
vision.conclusion: USD.online will stand as the builder of a dual order: global liquidity and human kindness. Here, wealth walks hand in hand with humanity, and technology advances side by side with philanthropy.

mission.title: Philanthropic Mission
mission.content1: The financial logic and charitable logic of USD.online are deeply coupled. We have chosen global autism care programs for children as the core direction of our philanthropy.
mission.commitment1: â€¢ A portion of net platform revenue â†’ Dedicated donations to global autism foundations
mission.commitment2: â€¢ On-chain disclosure â†’ Every donation flow is transparent and traceable, making "kindness visible, trust verifiable"
mission.value1: â€¢ Every donation is a seed of care
mission.value2: â€¢ Every yield is an echo of life
mission.value3: â€¢ Every contributor is a co-builder of public good
mission.conclusion: USD.online believes: capital does not only create wealth, it should also kindle the warmth of humanity.

strategy.title: Strategic Horizon
strategy.content1: The significance of USD.online goes beyond contribution. It is the convergence point of wealth civilization and philanthropic civilization:
strategy.point1: â€¢ It is an experimental ground for financial narratives
strategy.point2: â€¢ It is the confluence of technology and humanity
strategy.point3: â€¢ It is the symphony of global capital and philanthropic spirit
strategy.conclusion: The existence of USD.online is not just a tool for wealth accumulationâ€”it is a collective leap forward in human financial civilization. What it creates is not only wealth, but a new paradigm of finance that resonates with humanity.

conclusion.title: Conclusion Â· Wealth Beyond Profit, Capital in Harmony with Charity
conclusion.content1: USD.online is not only the engine of wealth, but also the bridge of kindness.
conclusion.content2: It unites capital, AI technology, and philanthropy into one, converging into a financial civilization of the human future.
conclusion.content3: It is not merely a donation platformâ€”it is a declaration of humanity's co-built civilization on-chain.

projectIntro.backgroundTitle: ðŸŒ Macro Context: A Great Change Unseen in a Century
projectIntro.backgroundDesc: The global financial system is at a historic turning point:

projectIntro.backgroundPoint2: â€¢ Digital extension of dollar hegemony â€” SWIFT, stablecoins, and geopolitical financial fragmentation;
projectIntro.backgroundPoint3: â€¢ Rise of AI algorithmic civilization â€” Financial logic is being rewritten by intelligent models.
projectIntro.backgroundSummary: Against this backdrop, USD.online is not just a platform, but the civilizational prototype of a new global capital order. It integrates Wall Street quantitative wisdom, Web3 decentralization spirit, and AI adaptive intelligence to create an international financial civilization engine that transcends investment itself.

staking.title: Staking & Returns
staking.period: â€¢ Staking periods: 3 months / 6 months / 12 months.
staking.dailyRate: â€¢ Daily yield: 0.25% / 0.4% / 1% (Example: 100U corresponds to 0.25U / 0.4U / 1U daily).
staking.linear: â€¢ Returns accumulate linearly and can be claimed anytime.

fees.title: Management Fees & Early Withdrawal
fees.managementFee: â€¢ Management fee: 1% of deposit amount, goes to feeWallet.
fees.earlyWithdrawal: â€¢ Early withdrawal: 40% penalty (on principal), goes to feeWallet; rewards are not penalized and automatically distributed.

invite.title: Referral & Level System
invite.binding: â€¢ Binding: First deposit â‰¥200U required for binding, short code â†’ address mapping; cannot be changed after binding, allows self-referral/circular referrals.
invite.teamStaking: â€¢ Team total staking: Real-time sum of net principal under custody for self + direct referrals + next level down (A+B+C); deducted upon redemption; used only for level determination.
invite.levelChange: â€¢ Level changes only affect future deposits, no retroactive adjustments.

settlement.title: Reward Settlement & Fund Flow
settlement.rewardBase: â€¢ Reward base: Calculated on gross deposit amount A (before 1% deduction).
settlement.distribution: â€¢ Distribution form: Each deposit immediately records into "claimable balance" (USDT), not immediate transfer.

usdo.title: USDo Stablecoin Mechanism
usdo.totalSupply: â€¢ Total supply cap: 100,000,000 tokens; decimals: 6 (consistent with USDT).
usdo.mintingRule: â€¢ Minting rule: Only minted during user self-investment at 5 USDo / 1 USDT instantly; does not participate in referral rewards.
usdo.capProtection: â€¢ Cap protection: If current deposit would exceed the limit, reject the deposit.
usdo.transferSwitch: â€¢ Transfer switch: USDo can be normally transferred and traded after the owner-controlled switch is enabled.
usdo.narrative: â€¢ Narrative: USDo targets stablecoin scenarios, with future plans for 1:1 USD exchange experience and clearing channels.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Q: Can I bind subordinates without initial deposit? A: No, you need an initial deposit â‰¥200U to bind.
faq.q2: Q: How long for rewards to arrive? A: Immediately recorded in "claimable balance" after deposit, can be claimed anytime.
faq.q3: Q: Does early withdrawal affect earned rewards? A: No, rewards are not penalized, only 40% penalty on principal.
faq.q4: Q: Does USDo give referral rewards? A: No, USDo is only for self-investment minting.

team.title: About Us
team.description: Learn about the USD.online team and vision

company.title: USD.online Financial Limited Introduction
company.description: USD.online is committed to building next-generation financial infrastructure, deeply integrating AI-driven strategies, DeFi protocols, and stablecoin clearing mechanisms to create transparent, auditable, and sustainable financial networks. We are advancing regulatory compliance in both the UK and Hong Kong, partnering with global collaborators to build a future-oriented clearing system and philanthropic financial ecosystem.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.description: USD.online brings together a cross-disciplinary, highly collaborative core team with backgrounds spanning quantitative investment, software engineering, regulatory compliance, and asset management. Core members have worked at international investment banks, top hedge funds, technology companies, and regulatory institutions, with hands-on experience in AI quantitative strategies, on-chain system development, clearing and risk control, stablecoin issuance, UK/Hong Kong dual compliance, and philanthropic finance coordination. Since 2026, we have adhered to the operating philosophy of 'iterate quickly, maintain full transparency,' continuously publishing real operating data, third-party audit summaries, and Proof of Reserves (PoR), building a credible and sustainable collaborative ecosystem based on data.

chris.name: Chris Chew
chris.title: Founder of USD.ONLINE
chris.intro: Leading company strategy, capital partnerships, compliance, and governance. 8+ years of experience in cross-exchange/cross-chain liquidity and quantitative fund management, with historical AUM of 400M+ USD. Long-term focus on cross-border capital flows and compliance implementation in the UK, Hong Kong, and Dubai. Graduate of London School of Economics (LSE).
chris.point1: Current Founder & CEO of USD.online, responsible for strategic planning, capital partnerships, compliance pathways, and corporate governance mechanisms.
chris.point2: 8+ years in digital assets, covering cross-exchange/cross-chain liquidity, market making, and quantitative fund management; cumulative AUM 450M+ USD.
chris.point3: Deep expertise in cross-border capital flows and compliance implementation in the UK, Hong Kong, and Dubai, familiar with stablecoin/clearing, custody integration, auditing, and disclosure processes.
chris.point4: Advocates 'data transparency + risk control priority' product methodology, driving PoR proof of reserves, buyback and burn mechanisms.
chris.point5: Education: London School of Economics (LSE) graduate.

grant.name: Grant Lee
grant.title: Head of Institutional & Capital Markets at USD.ONLINE
grant.intro: Exchange listing/market making alliances + institutional partnership implementation
grant.point1: Responsible for top-tier and regional CEX listings and deposit/withdrawal integration, market making alliances and support mechanisms.
grant.point2: Expanding partnerships with custody, audit, oracle, payment, and risk control vendors.
grant.point3: Co-building investor communication, secondary liquidity, and buyback execution coordination mechanisms.

frank.name: Frank Gabriele
frank.title: Co-Founder & CTO (AI/Quantitative)
frank.point1: Previously worked at Renaissance Technologies hedge fund on Wall Street, covering statistical arbitrage, market making, capital efficiency allocation, leading real-time risk control system implementation.
frank.point2: On the Web3 side, led on-chain data collection, anomaly detection, and MEV risk protection solutions.
frank.point3: Responsible for USD.online Alpha engine and clearing engine technical roadmap, code review, and security audit coordination.
frank.point4: Graduate of Yale University Computer Science.

ying.name: Ying Huang
ying.title: Chief Compliance Officer at USD.ONLINE (Singapore/UK)
ying.point1: Graduate of National University of Singapore Faculty of Law, with a Master of Laws degree from the UK, possessing solid compliance theoretical foundations in both common and civil law systems.
ying.point2: Previously worked at top international law firms and multinational financial institutions, responsible for compliance license applications, regulatory communication, and policy assessment in Singapore, UK, and EU regions.
ying.point3: Leading the company's dual-track compliance strategy with Singapore's MAS and UK's FCA, building cross-border compliance frameworks that meet multi-country regulatory requirements.
ying.point4: Expert in coordinating cross-border data compliance, AML, and transaction monitoring system construction, managing external legal and audit partnership networks.
ying.point5: Deeply involved in the company's stablecoin issuance, asset custody, and clearing business compliance implementation in global markets, ensuring business expansion meets local regulatory requirements.
